about.details:
Incorporated in 2013, ICL Organic Dairy Products Ltd is engaged in all sorts of dairy business such as dairy farming, breeding of mammals, and animal husbandry. The company takes the animals either under an agreement or rent with any other person on profit sharing basis to deal with all kinds of products such as milk, cream, paneer, ghee and other by-products.

The company deals with milk contractors, dairymen, vendors, milers, dealers, and purveyors. The company is mainly active in Bareilly, Badaun, and Pilibhit districts of Uttar Pradesh. The company focuses on good quality milk and has a veterinary supporting staff to train the farmers.

The main work of the company is to collect the milk from other dairy farmers and its own facility and distribute it to dairy establishments, sweet shops and various households.

Competitive Strengths

1. Long-standing client base
2. Existing supplier relationship
3. Focus on a quality product

faqs.question: What is the ICL Dairy IPO?
faqs.answer:
ICL Dairy IPO is a SME IPO of 2040000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹4.08 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹20 per share. The minimum order quantity is 6000.

The IPO opens on January 31, 2020, and closes on February 7, 2020.

Cameo Corporate Services Limited is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in ICL Dairy IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in ICL Dairy IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in ICL Dairy IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in ICL Dairy IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'ICL Dairy IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When ICL Dairy IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The ICL Dairy IPO opens on January 31, 2020 and closes on February 7, 2020.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of ICL Dairy IPO?
faqs.answer: ICL Dairy IPO lot size is 6000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,20,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for ICL Dairy IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in ICL Dairy IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is ICL Dairy IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for ICL Dairy IPO will be done on Tuesday, February 11, 2020, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Thursday, February 13, 2020. Check the ICL Dairy IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is ICL Dairy IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The ICL Dairy IPO listing date is on Monday, February 17, 2020.
